snippet: Adam Scott broke the course record Wednesday at Port Royal in Southampton, Bermuda, with a seven-under 64 to win the PGA Grand Slam of Golf by two shots over Justin Rose.
abstract: Adam Scott wins PGA Grand Slam of Golf at Port Royal in Southampton, Bermuda, breaking course record.
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott broke the course record Wednesday at Port Royal in Southampton, Bermuda, with a seven-under 64 to win the PGA Grand Slam of Golf by two shots over Justin Rose.
